display-value: The B10 van is a multi-role vehicle depending on how it's configured. Available as a passenger option, cargo option, police mode, utility mode it's only limitation is what you need it for. It's electric/hybrid power train can function as a pure electric vehicle within the city and then use the more traditional power-train in remote areas such as wilderness construction sites.
name: DESCRIPTION
value: The B10 van is a multi-role vehicle depending on how it's configured. Available as a passenger option, cargo option, police mode, utility mode it's only limitation is what you need it for. It's electric/hybrid power train can function as a pure electric vehicle within the city and then use the more traditional power-train in remote areas such as wilderness construction sites.
